subject: Sailboats and Sailing
lead_paragraph: While many might get wistful or edgy when land disappears from the horizon, Jean-Eudes Renier -- a banker by profession and a former participant in the Fastnet race -- relishes the isolation.
snippet: While many might get wistful or edgy when land disappears from the horizon, Jean-Eudes Renier -- a banker by profession and a former participant in the Fastnet race -- relishes the isolation.
